[Groovy] Class GormInstanceApi

java.lang.Object

@groovy.transform.CompileStatic
class GormInstanceApi
extends AbstractGormApi

Instance methods of the GORM API.

Parameters:
- the entity/domain class
Authors:
Graeme Rocher
